title: Death Domain
content:
Putrefy a creature with the nectrotic energy filling your hands.

Protection from Evil and Good

Protect an ally against the attacks and powers of aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead.The target can't be Charmed, Frightened, or possessed by them, and when these creatures attack it, they do so with disadvantage.Until Long Rest

Melee Concentration

Protect a creature from attacks increase: Increase its Armour Class by 2

18m/60ft Concentration

Put creatures into a magic
